sentence.text: The membrane-type frizzled-related protein (embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching) is the only gene so far reported implicated in autosomal recessive, non-syndromic and syndromic forms of PM.

entity.text: embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching

sentence.text: To identify the disease-causing defect in these families, we first analysed embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching gene, then some candidate genes (regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, transcription initiation from RNA polymerase II promoter, positive regulation of gene expression, SOX2, visual perception-3 and visual perception) and loci (MCOP1, NNO1 and embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching) previously implicated in different forms of microphthalmia.

entity.text: embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching
regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
transcription initiation from RNA polymerase II promoter
embryo development ending in birth or egg hatching
